contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 14, 1988 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-championship-sec
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Finale from Checkmate. 13 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Soprano, Heart Of England
1st Prize: £300.00 (Mk Co-Op trophy) 2nd Prize: £150.00 (Legal & General trophy) 3rd Prize: £100.00 (Yardleys trophy) 4th Prize: £50.00 Supplementary information taken from contest programme
March 7, 2011, 5:54 p.m. Dec. 6, 2012, 8:26 a.m.

2 Aveley Band Martin Heartfield
3 Fishburn Band Jim Foxcroft
4 Welwyn Garden City Band Lyn Morgan
